Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
ArityMissmatchException indicating invalid arity
BddManagerClass to handle the creation and destruction of Cudd related objects.The idea of having this class is to create a global object that is in charge of the resource deallocation of Cudd entities. For this reason only one manager is used and this class implements the singleton pattern
ComplementView< View >Complement relation viewA complement view \(C\) for a relation view \(R\) provides operations such that \(C\) behaves like the complement of \(R\)
ConstCPRelViewConstant view on a relation variableA constant view \(C\) for a ground relation \(G\) provides operations such that \(C\) behaves like the relation view with domain \([G,G]\)
CPRelVarRelation variables.This class provides the way to create and access information of relation variables
CPRelVarImpRelation domain
CPRelViewView for relation variables.Normal view on variable implementation of relation variables
DescIteratorIterator on a permutation descriptor
Equal< ViewLeft, ViewRight >Propagates: \( \forall t : t \in A \iff t \in B \)
ExceptionBaseException base class
GRelationClass representing a ground relation.This class provides a way to represent a relation along with operations on it. In all the documentation of this class this refers to the represented relation. There are two basic notions attached to a relation:

  • Its arity that is the number of elements that each tuple in the relation has.
  • Its cardinality, which is the total number of tuple the relation contains
GRelationIterIterator on the tuples of a ground relation
Intersect< View0, View1, View2 >Intersection propagator between two relations
InvalidAritySourceException indicating invalid arity according to configuration
InvalidJoinException indicating invalid join
InvalidPermDescriptorException indicating invalid permutation description
InvalidPermutationException indicating invalid permutation
InvalidProjectionException indicating invalid projection
InvalidRelationSourceException indicating invalid stream containing relation
Join< ViewA, ViewB, ViewC >Join propagator between two relations
OutOfLimitsException indicating invalid limits
PermDescriptorDescribes a permutation on a relationA Permutation descriptor describes the way to perform a given permutation on a relation
PermutedView< View >Permuted relation viewA permuted view \(Xp\) for a relation view \(R\) provides operations such that \(Xp\) behaves like the permutation of \(R\) defined by the permutation description \( desc \)
Project< ViewA, ViewB >Propagates: \( \Pi_{p}A = B \).\( A \subseteq \mathcal{U}_{n},\; B \subseteq \mathcal{U}_{n-p} \) and \(p\) is the number of columns on the right (counting from zero) to project on
RelationImplStores the representation of a relation using BDDs
RelationImplIterClass to iterate on tuples of a relation implementation
TupleClass to abstract a tuple in a relation
VariableEmptyDomainException indicating empty domain declaration
